resources.string: Place here tutorials to watch later
Place here tutorials to share with your friends
Add tutorials to these playlists so you can remember them and sync them.
Do you really want to remove this video from your \'Watch Later\' list ?
Do you really want to remove this video from your \'Social\' list ?
Do you really want to remove this video from your \'Favorites\' list ?

This app was designed to help you progress in your yoyo play and provide quick and easy access to your favorite tutorials.
	You may start by opening the left menu and browsing your favorite sources of tutorials, when you find one you like, simply press one of the add buttons to add it to one of your tuts lists.
	Once a few tuts are in your lists, you can share them with your friends.
	For offline viewing, we recommend the excellent YTD app from dentex at : 
	http://dentex.github.io/apps/youtubedownloader

The creators would like to thanks in no particular order : 

	-Andre Boulay from yoyoeXpert

	-Steve Brown and Chris Mikulin from Caribou Lodge

	-Colinn from YoyoBlast

	-Jeremy McKay from MrYoyoThrower 

	-Emmanuel Gabriel from Blackhop 

 for their permission to index their content and overall awesomeness.
